title: Love at Night
overview: When night fell and the noisy offices quieted down, Xu Qingyu and Mo Ling Ze met for the first time.Xu Qing Yu is a white collar worker and works hard all year round. She was in a long-term relationship with Fan Yun Xi and was preparing for the wedding when she found out that he had cheated on her. Fan Yun Xi tried to explain that it was a misunderstanding, but Xu Qingyu insisted on breaking up. At this time, Xu Qingyu meets Mo Ling Ze, and they have a misunderstanding. They thought they would never meet again, their paths cross again when Mo Ling Ze takes over the affairs of the firm where Xu Qing Yu works.Now they can no longer avoid each other. On the one hand, Mo Ling Ze, he is amused by Xu Qingyu's reaction, he is stubborn, but at the same time takes care of her. On the other hand, Fan Yun Xi is desperately trying to get her back. Realizing what she wants for herself, Xu Qingyu decides to start life anew.
